content: this is a great pattern that works up super fast make it in all your favorite colors you will get sizing directions for both crop top and standard length in all sizes xs - 4x this pattern is for advanced beginners this is an original design the instructions are in american stitches you will receive written and photo instructions as well as schematics & stitch work chart materials wool and the gang shiny happy cotton / category 4 yarn crochet hook size i-9 / 5 5 mm tapestry needle to weave ends tape measure fasteners or safety pins button or tag of choice get the pattern free on my blog here http //www stitchandhustle com/free-patterns/catalina-crochet-tank-top-free-pattern http //www stitchandhustle com/free-patterns/catalina-crochet-tank-top-free-pattern
